author: Source: Chardandilminsternews.co.uk
title: Victor Valdes' agent suggests goalkeeper will leave Manchester United in January - Chardandilminsternews.co.uk
text:
The ex-Barcelona goalkeeper has only made two appearances since joining the Red Devils in January after recovering from knee surgery. Valdes has had a strained relationship with United manager Louis van Gaal and was not given a squad number for the 2015-16 campaign.
 Chardandilminsternews.co.uk.
